content: In the Kodian Frontier Rangers' dining facility, MORK Relief Soup is always available at every meal, regardless of the main menu being served. This practice ensures that there is a nutritious, filling, and easily accessible option for rangers who may be in need of a quick, satisfying meal or for those who have dietary restrictions or preferences. Along with the MORK Relief Soup, the dining facility also provides coffee and tea throughout the day, offering a source of warmth and comfort for the rangers during their breaks or before and after their shifts. This combination of soup, coffee, and tea ensures that rangers have access to convenient, nutritious, and comforting food options at all times.
